alert.note: Alert for Ford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:41PM CDT until July 21 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL FORD...SOUTH CENTRAL FINNEY...NORTHWESTERN MEADE... GRAY AND NORTHERN HASKELL COUNTIES... At 1141 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Plymell, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cimarron, Montezuma, Pierceville, Copeland, Ingalls, Ensign, Charleston, Tice and The Haggard Elev. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
